suggestions.original: To improve the picture organization, consider increasing the spacing between the elements to reduce overlap and enhance clarity. Define the boundaries more distinctly to ensure each element stands out. Additionally, you could experiment with varying the sizes of the objects to create a more dynamic composition and guide the viewer's eye more effectively. Balancing the elements more symmetrically could also help in achieving a more harmonious arrangement.
